name: gitbook-plugin-html-minifier
description: This is a HTML minifier for GitBook plugin. Run HTML minify after build.

caseSensitive.description: Treat attributes in case sensitive manner (useful for custom HTML tags)

collapseBooleanAttributes.description: Omit attribute values from boolean attributes

collapseInlineTagWhitespace.description: Don't leave any spaces between display:inline; elements when collapsing. Must be used in conjunction with collapseWhitespace=true

collapseWhitespace.description: Collapse white space that contributes to text nodes in a document tree

conservativeCollapse.description: Always collapse to 1 space (never remove it entirely). Must be used in conjunction with collapseWhitespace=true

customAttrAssign.description:
Arrays of regex'es that allow to support custom attribute assign expressions (e.g. '
')

customAttrSurround.description: Arrays of regex'es that allow to support custom attribute surround expressions (e.g. <input {{#if value}}checked="checked"{{/if}}>)

decodeEntities.description: Use direct Unicode characters whenever possible

html5.description: Parse input according to HTML5 specifications

includeAutoGeneratedTags.description: Insert tags generated by HTML parser

keepClosingSlash.description: Keep the trailing slash on singleton elements

minifyCSS.description: Minify CSS in style elements and style attributes (uses clean-css) false (could be true, Object, Function(text))

minifyJS.description: Minify JavaScript in script elements and event attributes (uses UglifyJS) false (could be true, Object, Function(text, inline))

minifyURLs.description: Minify URLs in various attributes (uses relateurl) false (could be String, Object, Function(text))

preserveLineBreaks.description: Always collapse to 1 line break (never remove it entirely) when whitespace between tags include a line break. Must be used in conjunction with collapseWhitespace=true

preventAttributesEscaping.description: Prevents the escaping of the values of attributes

processConditionalComments.description: Process contents of conditional comments through minifier

processScripts.description: Array of strings corresponding to types of script elements to process through minifier (e.g. text/ng-template, text/x-handlebars-template, etc.)

quoteCharacter.description: Type of quote to use for attribute values (' or ")

removeAttributeQuotes.description: Remove quotes around attributes when possible

removeEmptyAttributes.description: Remove all attributes with whitespace-only values false (could be true, Function(attrName, tag))

removeEmptyElements.description: Remove all elements with empty contents

removeRedundantAttributes.description: Remove attributes when value matches default.

removeScriptTypeAttributes.description: Remove type="text/javascript" from script tags. Other type attribute values are left intact

removeStyleLinkTypeAttributes.description: Remove type="text/css" from style and link tags. Other type attribute values are left intact

removeTagWhitespace.description: Remove space between attributes whenever possible. Note that this will result in invalid HTML!

useShortDoctype.description: Replaces the doctype with the short (HTML5) doctype
